text:
"log4j:ERROR Attempted to append to closed appender named [console]."

I got this error message when I configure two times a category in the log4j.xml and log4j doesn't log anything. It's pretty unusable and hard to find in a big config file. Demo log4j.xml attached.
creator: aap@mail.palacsint.hu
